QuestData.Title: Doras the Wind Rider Master
QuestData.Description: I've written a letter of thanks to Grimtak. Will you deliver it for me? If you've already been to the Razor Hill and spoken with their wind rider master, then you can fly a wind rider back there.$B$BTake my letter to Doras, the wind rider master of Orgrimmar, and speak with him about transport to Razor Hill.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Gryshka's Letter to Doras in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you need one of my wind riders?
QuestData.RewardText: You have to get this to Razor Hill in Durotar? Yes, I can get you there...
